blogPost.excerpt: www.realsy.app is a productivity tool for realtors to better stay organized with their listings by combining to-do’s, expenses, and notes all organized in one place.
blogPost.body: www.realsy.app is a productivity tool for realtors to better stay organized with their listings by combining to-do’s, expenses, and notes all organized in one place.
blogPost.title: Realsy for Realtors - Stay on top of your listings.
blogPost.author: Nathan Beatty

localize.description: www.realsy.app 是一个生产力工具，为房地产经纪人更好地保持与他们的房源组织，结合待办事项，费用和笔记在一个地方组织。
www.realsy.app 是一個生產力工具，爲房地產經紀人更好地保持與他們的房源組織，結合待辦事項，費用和筆記在一個地方組織。

previous.excerpt: A free app that helps founders manage their investor courting process. If you know a founder raising capital or plan to do so yourself one day, this is a must. We are offering FounderZ created on our platform FREE to anyone starting a business this year.
previous.title: FounderZ - Free app for founders to manage the fund raising process

localize.description: 一款帮助创始人管理投资人追求过程的免费应用。如果你认识一个创始人在筹集资金，或者计划有一天自己也要这样做，这是一个必须要做的事情。我们将向今年创业的人免费提供在我们平台上创建的FounderZ。
localize.tagline: 创始人管理筹资过程的免费应用。

localize.description: 一款幫助創始人管理投資人追求過程的免費應用。如果你認識一個創始人在籌集資金，或者計劃有一天自己也要這樣做，這是一個必須要做的事情。我們將向今年創業的人免費提供在我們平臺上創建的FounderZ。
localize.tagline: 創始人管理籌資過程的免費應用。

next.excerpt: Your life is full of projects, and [whether you like it or not] you are a project manager. Get all the most relevant core concepts of project management in one place, written by a 5-year Program manager with a PMP. P.S. This is my first published product!
next.title: Project Management Core Concepts - Book on core concepts of project management in plain English

localize.description: 你的生活充满了项目，[不管你是否喜欢]你是一个项目经理。在一个地方得到所有最相关的项目管理的核心概念，由一个5年的项目经理与PMP写。P.S.这是我的第一本出版的产品!
localize.tagline: 用浅显的英语介绍项目管理的核心概念的书。

localize.description: 你的生活充滿了項目，[不管你是否喜歡]你是一個項目經理。在一個地方得到所有最相關的項目管理的核心概念，由一個5年的項目經理與PMP寫。P.S.這是我的第一本出版的產品!
localize.tagline: 用淺顯的英語介紹項目管理的核心概念的書。
